title: Rupyy appoints Vineet Tripathi as chief business officer
description: Vineet Tripathi has over two decades of experience with banks, insurance companies and NBFCs. In his previous stint, he served as the chief business officer at Poonawalla, and has held leadership positions at Bandhan Bank, Tata Capital, Kotak Mahindra Bank, GE Money and Birla Sun Life Insurance.
